useCase.name: Recruitment and Research Analysis

preconditions.precondition: Researcher defines criteria for participant selection.

successEndConditions.condition: Researcher receives feedback and data from participants.
Researcher receives synthesized results from AnalysisSystem.

useCase.trigger: Researcher initiates the recruitment and research analysis process.

mainSequence.step: Researcher defines criteria for participant selection.
RecruitmentPlatform queries potential participants based on criteria from UserDb.
UserDb returns a list of potential participants to RecruitmentPlatform.
RecruitmentPlatform sends recruitment invitations to Participants.
RecruitmentPlatform provides a list of participating users to Researcher.
Researcher conducts user research sessions with Participants.
Participant provides feedback and data to Researcher.
Researcher inputs user research data into AnalysisSystem.
AnalysisSystem provides synthesized results to Researcher.
Researcher updates project status to "Complete" on RecruitmentPlatform.
Researcher archives project data and findings on AnalysisSystem.
